rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card you own from outside the game.
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, choose one of the exiled cards at random. You may cast it without paying its mana cost.
notes:
Maybe: enters the battlefield exile five or more cards you own from outside the game. Upkeep: reveal and cast one at random

Maybe instead a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card?
